alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT OKALOOSA AND SOUTHEASTERN SANTA ROSA COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base to Point Baker. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Crestview, Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Milton, Valparaiso, Mary Esther, Bagdad, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Baker, Oriole Beach, Navarre, Shalimar, Cinco Bayou, Point Baker, Navarre Beach, and Roeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
